Datasets used for integration

    • Gene-Protein [Phytozome]
      • Populus trichocarpa v3.1
      • Data was downloaded from Phytozome
    • Protein Domain [Phytozome]
      • BioMart PFAM Protein Domains
    • Homology
      • Protein@Poplar-Protein@Arabidopsis-Protein [OMA]
      • Sequence alignments to other Plants
        • Protein@Poplar-Protein@Plants::UniProtKB-SP [Smith-Waterman]
    • References
      • Arabidopsis (TAIR) see Release notes for Arabidopsis
